font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 合并，混合：to combine into a unified or integrated whole; unite
【例】to amalgamate with an American company 与一家美国公司合并
【近】mix, fuse, intermix, compound, meld, comingle, integrate, intermingle
【反】separate, isolate分开，隔离

【记】 amalgam + ate 动词
